about-us.title: About us
about-us.header: Financial training and education - Mentorship and coaching
about-us.text-1: Hello, I’m Andreas Svoboda, a passionate professional with a strong focus on coaching, mentoring, and teaching. With a diverse background and extensive experience in the financial industry, I have dedicated my career to empowering individuals and organizations to achieve their fullest potential. With that purpose in mind I set up Vision Goal LLC in 2022.
about-us.text-2: Teaching and mentoring have become my true passion. As a Professor at United International Business Schools (UIBS) in Zurich and Geneva, I lecture on subjects including accounting, finance, and global banking, shaping the minds of students pursuing Bachelor’s and Master’s degrees. Additionally, I serve as the Department Head of Finance and Leadership, Banking and Finance at the Swiss Distance University of Applied Sciences (FFHS), where I guide aspiring professionals in their academic and professional development.
about-us.text-3: In addition to these roles, I have had the privilege of teaching at HSO in Zurich, Rapperswil, and Baar, with a specific focus on the EMBA program. At HSO, I have contributed to the education and growth of experienced professionals pursuing advanced degrees.

professional-career.title: Professional Career:
professional-career.text: Throughout my career, I have worked in various leadership roles, gaining valuable insights and expertise. I have held positions at notable companies, including Bank Julius Bär& Co. AG in Switzerland and Singapore, where I currently serve as the Head of Wealth Planning (WP) Life & Pension. I have also made significant contributions at the Liechtenstein Insurance Association, where I served as a Board Member, focusing on communication, marketing, public relations, strategy work, advocacy, and financial planning. Furthermore, I held the position of Management Director and Head of Finance at Wealth Assurance AG, where I managed the insurance company and oversaw strategic orientation, risk management, and key operational functions.

teaching-experience-1.title: Education and Teaching Experience:
teaching-experience-1.text-1: My dedication to continuous learning and professional development is reflected in my academic journey. I hold a LL.M. UZH International Business Law from the University of Zurich, a Master of Science Professional Accountancy from the University of London, and a Doctor of Business Administration from the University of Liverpool. In addition to my academic achievements, I have obtained a Master of Business Administration from the University of Southern Queensland and a Betriebsökonom HWV from the Hochschule für Wirtschaft Zürich HWZ.
teaching-experience-1.text-2: As a finance professional turned educator, I bring a wealth of expertise and real-world experience to the classroom. I am committed to delivering engaging and impactful lessons that inspire students to succeed in their careers and make a difference in the world. My teaching roles at UIBS, FFHS, and HSO allow me to shape the next generation of professionals, imparting knowledge at both Bachelor’s and Master’s levels.

skills.title: Skills and Expertise:
skills.text: With fluency in German and English, I possess strong communication skills that enable me to connect effectively with diverse audiences. Throughout my career, I have demonstrated exceptional leadership, strategic thinking, and analytical abilities. My expertise spans areas such as financial planning, risk management, accounting, and investment management. I am well-versed in the intricacies of the finance industry and possess a deep understanding of sustainable finance, capital markets, and portfolio management.

professional-passion.title: My Professional Passion:
professional-passion.text: As a seasoned professional, I am driven by a passion for coaching, mentoring, and teaching. I am dedicated to empowering individuals and organizations, helping them realize their goals and unlock their full potential. With a diverse skill set, a deep understanding of the financial industry, and a commitment to continuous growth and learning, I am excited to collaborate with motivated individuals and contribute to their success.

wealth-planning.title: Wealth Planning and Financial Coaching
wealth-planning.sub-title: Personalized wealth planning and financial coaching services.
wealth-planning.desc: I can help you to assess your financial goals, develop customized wealth management strategies, and provide guidance on investments, retirement planning, insurance, and risk management. You will get empower to make informed financial decisions and achieve your long-term financial objectives.

lectures.title: Lectures and Workshops on Finance and Business
lectures.desc: Lectures and workshops in educational institutions or corporate settings. Thanks to my expertise in accounting, finance, global banking, and business innovation I will deliver well-suited engaging and insightful sessions. Whether it’s teaching undergraduate or graduate students or providing professional development training to corporate professionals, I will share my knowledge, insights, and practical examples to enhance financial literacy and business acumen.

leadership.title: Leadership and Career Mentoring
leadership.desc: With my experience as a board member, management director, and head of departments, I will guide aspiring professionals and emerging leaders in developing their leadership skills, strategic thinking, and decision-making abilities. Through one-on-one mentoring sessions, you will get career guidance, help to navigate challenges, and assistance in setting achievable goals for personal and professional growth

mentoring.title: Mentoring for Students
mentoring.desc: Mentorship programs specifically tailored to students pursuing education or careers in the business sector. Through mentorship, you will get guidance, support, and practical advice to help you navigate your educational journey or early career stages. Whether it’s assisting students in selecting the right academic programs, offering insights on internships and job opportunities, or providing guidance on developing essential skills and networking, my mentoring services can empower you to make informed decisions, set meaningful goals, and succeed in your chosen paths. By sharing my own experiences, knowledge, and industry connections, You will get inspire and foster your personal and professional development.
